Basic meanings of word: to acquire, to purchase, (reflexive) to gain
to unhook, to pick up/ get one's hands on
to free/ release, to bring out (an idea), (vulgar) go away!
to put together/ make up/ draw up, to elaborate, to supervise
(generic) to form, to shape, to train
to pilot a vehicle, to direct/ guide people
(card games) to draw from the deck, to pick from a set of options
to write in a well defined manner
